Topic.Title: A request for the game site.

Posts.EditableText:
I Didn't see any Strategy or Simulation category on the game site, is it possible to get
them two categories?, that'll be cool.
Posts.HTML:
I Didn't see any Strategy or Simulation category on the game site, is it possible to get
them two categories?, that'll be cool.

Posts.EditableText: Are there any existing games on the site that would better fit into one of those categories?
Posts.HTML: Are there any existing games on the site that would better fit into one of those categories?

Thana.
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText: Well it's not going to make the games suddenly appear - and we've got about 9 years' worth of games up there at the moment...

Posts.EditableText:
I saw a couple of Strategy games up there on the site, like that stock market game and that game where
you can mine ore and sell stuff.

Also my game I've been working on is a Strategy/Simulation to, I Know it'll be hard work to
put these two categories up there now but It'll eventually need to be done and I think it'll be better
to do it now then wait even longer when there are even more games to go through.
